thread.title: Tunisia: 'There Are Serious Threats to UGTT Premises and Leaders' - Tahri
thread.title_full: Tunisia: 'There Are Serious Threats to UGTT Premises and Leaders' - Tahri

title: Tunisia: 'There Are Serious Threats to UGTT Premises and Leaders' - Tahri
text:
Nigeria: Relocate Boko Haram Prisoners Ohanaeze Ndigbo Urges Buhari 
Tunis — There are serious threats to premises of the Tunisian General Labour Union (UGTT) and its leaders, UGTT spokesman Sami Tahri told TAP on Wednesday. 
Prime Minister Habib Essid, on Monday, alerted UGTT Secretary-General Houcine Abassi of the presence of serious threats against the UGTT and its leaders, he noted. 
He also said the Ministry of the Interior has taken all needed measures to this effect, without providing details on the nature of these threats or the identity of the targeted persons. 
However, Sami Tahri drew the attention to the death threats against the Secretary-General and some UGTT leaders posted on Takfiri social network pages and more particularly on Twitter. Tunisia
